name: Arnold's Weeding
description:
Controls:

Right and left on  dPad to move

Up and down on dPad to climb ladders

B to attack

X to roll

A to jump

Goal:

Try to destroy all the plants in a limited time (there aren't any outside the house)

WARNING:#1 THIS GAME IS VERY DIFFICULT!

WARNING#2: THIS GAME ONLY WORKS ON WINDOWS, MAC, AND LINUX!

Tips:

If you press B twice in a row and then press down, you can do a shovel slam attack. And if you press B twice in a row and then press up, you get a spinning attack

Story:

You're and Armadillo in the country Animalia,  and you own a weeding business. One day, a customer asks you to do a job (as usual) and when you arrive, the house is infested by carnivorous plants!
